properties.name: Mack "Jody" Woodfox

properties.name: Arthur Raleigh
properties.desc: Arthur Raleigh, 34, was shot after he fled from a car and threatened the officer with a gun.
properties.Description: Arthur Raleigh, a 34 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 09/26/2011. Arthur Raleigh, 34, was shot after he fled from a car and threatened the officer with a gun.

properties.name: Yonas Alehegne
properties.desc: Alehegne allegedly attacked an officer with a metal bicycle chain before she returned fire, according to authorities. Police said the officer was treated for injuries to her face and head and released from the hospital.
properties.address: 200 MacArthur Blvd and Van Buren Ave
properties.Description: Yonas Alehegne, a 30 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 08/27/2015. Alehegne allegedly attacked an officer with a metal bicycle chain before she returned fire, according to authorities. Police said the officer was treated for injuries to her face and head and released from the hospital.

properties.name: Davon Jackson
properties.desc: Davon Jackson was shot and killed after he, John Sloan and a third man were stopped by Oakland police. Police said the men were armed and confrontational. Moments later, police shot Davon Jackson in the side while he sat in the driver's seat and John Sloan in the back of the head while he ran away.
properties.Description: Davon Jackson, a 30 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 05/18/2011. Davon Jackson was shot and killed after he, John Sloan and a third man were stopped by Oakland police. Police said the men were armed and confrontational. Moments later, police shot Davon Jackson in the side while he sat in the driver's seat and John Sloan in the back of the head while he ran away.

properties.agency: Oakland Unified School District police officers
properties.name: Raheim Brown
properties.desc: Raheim Brown was sitting in an allegedly stolen car with its hazard lights flashing near the grounds of Skyline High School. When officers approached the car, Brown stabbed one of the officers with a screwdriver. The other officer shot and killed Brown.
properties.Description: Raheim Brown, a 20 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 01/22/2011. Raheim Brown was sitting in an allegedly stolen car with its hazard lights flashing near the grounds of Skyline High School. When officers approached the car, Brown stabbed one of the officers with a screwdriver. The other officer shot and killed Brown.

properties.name: Roshawn Hill
properties.desc: Hill, a murder suspect who had been convicted of robbery, fired his gun into a police car after a robbery. An officer fired back, killing Hill
properties.Description: Roshawn Hill, a 18 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 06/05/2002. Hill, a murder suspect who had been convicted of robbery, fired his gun into a police car after a robbery. An officer fired back, killing Hill

properties.name: Willie Wilkens
properties.desc: Two rookie Oakland patrolmen shot and killed an undercover narcotics officer  who they didn't realize was one of their own - as he arrested a suspected car thief,
properties.Description: Willie Wilkens, a 29 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 01/11/2001. Two rookie Oakland patrolmen shot and killed an undercover narcotics officer  who they didn't realize was one of their own - as he arrested a suspected car thief,

properties.name: Richard Perkins
properties.desc: Officers were responding to a sideshow were standing around doing paperwork and waiting for tow trucks before the incident occurred. The officers scattered when Perkins pulled what appeared to be a black pistol from his waistband. No communication was made with Perkins before the officers fatally shot him.
properties.Description: Richard Perkins, a 39 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 11/15/2015. Officers were responding to a sideshow were standing around doing paperwork and waiting for tow trucks before the incident occurred. The officers scattered when Perkins pulled what appeared to be a black pistol from his waistband. No communication was made with Perkins before the officers fatally shot him.

properties.Description: Pedro Ariel Hernandez, a 19 year old Hispanic/Latino Male was killed by police on 07/27/2011. Pedro Ariel Hernandez was killed after he fled from the CHP and crashed near an Oakland freeway off-ramp.

properties.name: Jason Alexander Brown
properties.desc: Jason Brown reportedly killed himself during a standoff at an Oakland motel.
properties.Description: Jason Alexander Brown, a 18 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 11/19/2015. Jason Brown reportedly killed himself during a standoff at an Oakland motel.

properties.name: Jacorey Calhoun
properties.desc: Alameda County Deputy Thoms fatally shot Jacorey Calhoun, 23, on Aug. 3 near 105th and Edes avenues after Calhoun allegedly fled from an Oakland police car stop. Officers had tried to stop Calhoun as he drove a 2001 Volvo near 55th and Fairfax avenues in East Oakland. The Volvo was connected to a home-invasion robbery July 12.
properties.Description: Jacorey Calhoun, a 23 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 08/03/2014. Alameda County Deputy Thoms fatally shot Jacorey Calhoun, 23, on Aug. 3 near 105th and Edes avenues after Calhoun allegedly fled from an Oakland police car stop. Officers had tried to stop Calhoun as he drove a 2001 Volvo near 55th and Fairfax avenues in East Oakland. The Volvo was connected to a home-invasion robbery July 12.

properties.name: Maurice Esters
properties.desc: Officers Mike Yoell and Anthony Centeno shot Maurice Esters when he allegedly raised a gun in what police considered a threatening manner.
properties.Description: Maurice Esters, a 28 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 07/04/2000. Officers Mike Yoell and Anthony Centeno shot Maurice Esters when he allegedly raised a gun in what police considered a threatening manner.

properties.name: Obataiye Edwards
properties.desc: Edwards was shot after a in-vehicle pursuit ended with Edwards crashing into a home, and then running away on foot. His .380 semi-automatic pistol, was recovered at the scene.
properties.Description: Obataiye Edwards, a 19 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 12/20/2010. Edwards was shot after a in-vehicle pursuit ended with Edwards crashing into a home, and then running away on foot. His .380 semi-automatic pistol, was recovered at the scene.

properties.desc: Clements was suspected of sexual assault, and when officers arrived at his residence, he came out and shot an officer in the chest. Then, officers shot him to death.
properties.Description: Antonio Clements, a 49 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 08/03/2015. Clements was suspected of sexual assault, and when officers arrived at his residence, he came out and shot an officer in the chest. Then, officers shot him to death.

properties.Description: Jody Perry, a 37 year old African-American/Black Female was killed by police on 11/09/2003. Gregory Charles and Jody Perry were killed, and Charles' 7-year-old son was seriously injured, when a suspected drunken driver who was fleeing from police ran a red light and crashed into their car.

properties.name: Ronald Brazier

properties.Description: Demouria Hogg, a 30 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 06/06/2015. Hogg was unconscious in his car, investigations are open to determine why the police officers opened fire.

properties.name: Booker Carloss II

properties.Description: Booker Carloss II, a 50 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 11/04/2004. Carloss was shot and killed when he charged at police with an ax after they shot him with stun guns and a bean-bag.

properties.name: Brownie Polk
properties.desc: Polk was holding a hatchet over his head in a threatening manner when he was shot. The owner of Tolin Liquor Store had called police to report that Polk, 46, was causing problems inside the store by harassing the owner and store customers.
properties.Description: Brownie Polk, a 46 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 08/01/2009. Polk was holding a hatchet over his head in a threatening manner when he was shot. properties.Description: Marquita Bosley, a 25 year old African-American/Black Female was killed by police on 08/26/2009. Marquita Bosley was killed and her 19-month-old son Nai'ere was critically injured when a driver fleeing police crashed into Bosley's car in West Oakland.

properties.agency: Bay Area Rapid Transit Police Department
properties.name: Oscar Grant III
properties.desc: A restrained and unarmed Oscar Grant was shot in the back by by Bay Area Rapid Transit police officer Johannes Mehserle. Mehserle was found guilty of involuntary manslaughter, and sentenced to two years in state prison with 292 days of credit for time already served.
properties.Description: Oscar Grant III, a 22 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 01/01/2009. A restrained and unarmed Oscar Grant was shot in the back by by Bay Area Rapid Transit police officer Johannes Mehserle. Mehserle was found guilty of involuntary manslaughter, and sentenced to two years in state prison with 292 days of credit for time already served.

properties.Description: Charles Griffin, a 37 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 08/22/2008. Police shot and killed Charles Griffin after he tried to flee an arrest with an officer in his car.

properties.name: Robert Wollo
properties.desc: Two unidentified gang members were allegedly fleeing a police stop for a shooting crashed into and killed Robert Wollo, 75.
properties.Description: Robert Wollo, a 75 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 09/23/2013. Two unidentified gang members were allegedly fleeing a police stop for a shooting crashed into and killed Robert Wollo, 75.

properties.name: Kao Liew Saephan
properties.desc: Kao Liew Saephan was killed when the Toyota pickup truck he was riding in was broadsided by a Porsche Cayenne being chased by deputies in East Oakland. According to officials, deputies tried to stop the Porsche's driver for speeding at about 4:45 a.m. on International Boulevard. Deputies chased the Porsche when the driver didn't pull over. Less than a minute after the chase started, the Porsche reportedly ran a stop sign and crashed into the passenger side of the Toyota. Saephan died at a hospital. The driver of the truck was hospitalized in critical condition. The Porsche's driver, Gerardo Ulises Rodriguez, 27, was charged with reckless driving causing great bodily injury or death, evading police and hit and run.
properties.Description: Kao Liew Saephan, a 37 year old Asian/Pacific Islander Male was killed by police on 08/04/2013. Kao Liew Saephan was killed when the Toyota pickup truck he was riding in was broadsided by a Porsche Cayenne being chased by deputies in East Oakland. According to officials, deputies tried to stop the Porsche's driver for speeding at about 4:45 a.m. on International Boulevard. Deputies chased the Porsche when the driver didn't pull over. Less than a minute after the chase started, the Porsche reportedly ran a stop sign and crashed into the passenger side of the Toyota. Saephan died at a hospital. The driver of the truck was hospitalized in critical condition. The Porsche's driver, Gerardo Ulises Rodriguez, 27, was charged with reckless driving causing great bodily injury or death, evading police and hit and run.

properties.desc: Police were investigating reports of gunshots fired by two men in a red Infinity. The police pursued a car matching that description, which ran a red light, crashed into another vehicle, spun out and burst into flames. Flenaugh was the passenger. Flenaugh was shot by officers after he confronted the officers with multiple firearms.

properties.Description: Charles Hill, a 26 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 01/28/2000. Officers Marcell Patterson and William A. Pappas shot and killed Charles Hill.

properties.name: Antonio V. Mestas
properties.desc: Mestas led officers on a chase in a stolen SUV through east Oakland after they attempted to pull him over. Officers fired and hit Mestas after he fled the vehicle while holding a loaded handgun.
properties.Description: Antonio V. Mestas, a 19 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 01/21/2014. Mestas led officers on a chase in a stolen SUV through east Oakland after they attempted to pull him over. Officers fired and hit Mestas after he fled the vehicle while holding a loaded handgun.

properties.name: Jock'Lyante Quincy Adanandus Jr.
properties.desc: Jocklyante Adanandus Sr. and his toddler son, Jocklyante Adanandus Jr., were killed when the elder Adanandus tried to evade a traffic stop by driving through a railroad crossing.
properties.Description: Jock'Lyante Quincy Adanandus Jr., a 3 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 06/10/2006. Jocklyante Adanandus Sr. and his toddler son, Jocklyante Adanandus Jr., were killed when the elder Adanandus tried to evade a traffic stop by driving through a railroad crossing.

properties.name: Glen Willis
properties.desc: police shot and killed Willis after he stabbed an officer several times in the back and arm. The police described him as mentally unstable. Willis' family told police he was a known schizophrenic and was not taking his medication.
properties.Description: Glen Willis, a 47 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 08/06/2003. police shot and killed Willis after he stabbed an officer several times in the back and arm. The police described him as mentally unstable. Willis' family told police he was a known schizophrenic and was not taking his medication.

properties.name: Patrick Gaston
properties.desc: Patrick Gaston died during a struggle as police were arresting him on a drug sale charge.
properties.Description: Patrick Gaston, a 34 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 11/10/2005. Patrick Gaston died during a struggle as police were arresting him on a drug sale charge.

properties.name: Parnell Smith
properties.desc: Parnell Smith dropped a pistol on the ground and may not have fired it before two Oakland police officers shot him to death during a foot chase.
properties.Description: Parnell Smith, a 36 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 07/15/2009. Parnell Smith dropped a pistol on the ground and may not have fired it before two Oakland police officers shot him to death during a foot chase.

properties.name: Fletcher Jackson
properties.desc: Police responded to a report of gang activity. When they arrived, they say that Jackson and another man emerged with weapons. They fired, killing both Jackson and the other man. Witnesses say neither man had a gun.
properties.Description: Fletcher Jackson, a 30 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 05/18/2011. Police responded to a report of gang activity. When they arrived, they say that Jackson and another man emerged with weapons. They fired, killing both Jackson and the other man. Witnesses say neither man had a gun.

properties.name: Terrance Mearis
properties.desc: Mearis was fatally shot by Oakland police officers after Mearis grabbed one of the officer's gun during a struggle.
properties.Description: Terrance Mearis, a 20 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 10/05/2003. Mearis was fatally shot by Oakland police officers after Mearis grabbed one of the officer's gun during a struggle.

properties.name: Lesley Xavier Allen
properties.desc: Police shot and killed him after a chase into San Leandro.
properties.Description: Lesley Xavier Allen, a 21 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 07/19/2008. Police shot and killed him after a chase into San Leandro.

properties.name: Yuvette Henderson
properties.desc: Police chased a woman armed with a gun who was allegedly stealing from a store for about four blocks. They saw her with a gun and immediately opened fire, killing her at the scene.
properties.Description: Yuvette Henderson, a 38 year old African-American/Black Female was killed by police on 02/03/2015. Police chased a woman armed with a gun who was allegedly stealing from a store for about four blocks. They saw her with a gun and immediately opened fire, killing her at the scene.

properties.name: Ryan Lamont Hardy
properties.desc: Ryan Lamont Hardy died when the van he was driving crashed into a tree and caught fire during a police chase.
properties.Description: Ryan Lamont Hardy, a 28 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 09/21/2004. Ryan Lamont Hardy died when the van he was driving crashed into a tree and caught fire during a police chase.

properties.name: Todd Anthony Perea
properties.desc: Motorist Anthony Perea and pedestrian Floyd Ross Jr. were killed when homicide suspects being chased by police crashed into Perea's car, which then struck Ross.
properties.Description: Todd Anthony Perea, a 27 year old European-American/White Male was killed by police on 05/16/2009. Motorist Anthony Perea and pedestrian Floyd Ross Jr. were killed when homicide suspects being chased by police crashed into Perea's car, which then struck Ross.

properties.name: Mark Aragon
properties.desc: Connectis Guilton was reportedly fleeing from the CHP when his BMW collided with a SUV driven by Mark Aragon, killing both drivers.
properties.Description: Mark Aragon, a 32 year old Hispanic/Latino Male was killed by police on 11/04/2010. Connectis Guilton was reportedly fleeing from the CHP when his BMW collided with a SUV driven by Mark Aragon, killing both drivers.

properties.name: Monica Lucky
properties.desc: Monica Lucky was killed when her Honda was struck by a Lincoln Continental driven by Kevin Jackson, 21, who was fleeing police.
properties.address: West MacArthur Boulevard and Martin Luther King Jr. Way
properties.Description: Monica Lucky, a 41 year old African-American/Black Female was killed by police on 02/11/2007. Monica Lucky was killed when her Honda was struck by a Lincoln Continental driven by Kevin Jackson, 21, who was fleeing police.

properties.name: Gregory Charles
properties.desc: Gregory Charles and Jody Perry were killed, and Charles' 7-year-old son was seriously injured, when a suspected drunken driver who was fleeing from police ran a red light and crashed into their car.
properties.Description: Gregory Charles, a 50 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 11/09/2003. Gregory Charles and Jody Perry were killed, and Charles' 7-year-old son was seriously injured, when a suspected drunken driver who was fleeing from police ran a red light and crashed into their car.

properties.name: Guadalupe Manzo Ochoa
properties.desc: Shot dead by San Leandro police after she allegedly rammed several police cars at the end of a chase.
properties.Description: Guadalupe Manzo Ochoa, a 27 year old Hispanic/Latino Female was killed by police on 12/07/2014. Shot dead by San Leandro police after she allegedly rammed several police cars at the end of a chase.

properties.name: Floyd Ross Jr.
properties.desc: Motorist Anthony Perea and pedestrian Floyd Ross Jr. were killed when homicide suspects being chased by police crashed into Perea's car, which then struck Ross.
properties.Description: Floyd Ross Jr., a 41 year old Race unspecified Male was killed by police on 05/16/2009. Motorist Anthony Perea and pedestrian Floyd Ross Jr. were killed when homicide suspects being chased by police crashed into Perea's car, which then struck Ross.

properties.name: Diallo S. Neal Sr.
properties.desc: According to a quickly completed police investigation, Diallo S. Neal Sr. was killed when he lost control of his motorcycle and crashed into a bus bench, though numerous witnesses said they saw a CHP motorcycle officer chasing and possibly running him off the road just before the crash.
properties.Description: Diallo S. Neal Sr., a 33 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 10/10/2005. According to a quickly completed police investigation, Diallo S. Neal Sr. was killed when he lost control of his motorcycle and crashed into a bus bench, though numerous witnesses said they saw a CHP motorcycle officer chasing and possibly running him off the road just before the crash.

properties.name: John Sloan
properties.desc: John Sloan was shot and killed after he, Davon Jackson and a third man were stopped by Oakland police. Police said the men were armed and confrontational. Moments later, police shot Davon Jackson in the side while he sat in the driver's seat and John Sloan in the back of the head while he ran away.
properties.Description: John Sloan, a 23 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 05/18/2011. John Sloan was shot and killed after he, Davon Jackson and a third man were stopped by Oakland police. Police said the men were armed and confrontational. Moments later, police shot Davon Jackson in the side while he sat in the driver's seat and John Sloan in the back of the head while he ran away.

properties.name: Bernard Peters Jr.
properties.desc: Police received information that someone in a vehicle was armed with a gun. When they tried to pull the vehicle over, the driver sped away. After pursuit, the vehicle stopped and the three men inside fled in different directions. Peters was shot and killed. A handgun stolen from Georgia was discovered nearby.
properties.Description: Bernard Peters Jr., a 22 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 05/29/2013. Police received information that someone in a vehicle was armed with a gun. When they tried to pull the vehicle over, the driver sped away. After pursuit, the vehicle stopped and the three men inside fled in different directions. Peters was shot and killed. A handgun stolen from Georgia was discovered nearby.

properties.name: Martin Perez
properties.desc: Martin Perez was killed after he crashed his car near the Port of Oakland while fleeing the CHP.
properties.Description: Martin Perez, a 22 year old Hispanic/Latino Male was killed by police on 08/17/2012. Martin Perez was killed after he crashed his car near the Port of Oakland while fleeing the CHP.

properties.name: Kim Saelio
properties.desc: Saelio was shot as he fled to evade arrest on a murder warrant. During the flight, his vehicle struck an Oakland Police Car. Two officers fired, but hit Saelio.
properties.Description: Kim Saelio, a 22 year old Asian/Pacific Islander Male was killed by police on 06/21/2006. Saelio was shot as he fled to evade arrest on a murder warrant. During the flight, his vehicle struck an Oakland Police Car. Two officers fired, but hit Saelio.

properties.name: Kenneth Ross
properties.desc: Ross was killed when he pulled his gun on police as they tried to question him in the stairwell of an apartment complex.
properties.Description: Kenneth Ross, a 18 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 12/03/2009. Ross was killed when he pulled his gun on police as they tried to question him in the stairwell of an apartment complex.

properties.name: Alan Blueford
properties.desc: An Oakland police officer had chased Alan Blueford, 18, for three blocks through a darkened neighborhood before he tripped and fell along a home's chain-link fence. The officer shot Blueford three times in the chest, killing him. He said he believed Blueford had a gun, and one was recovered near the body.
properties.Description: Alan Blueford, a 18 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 05/06/2012. An Oakland police officer had chased Alan Blueford, 18, for three blocks through a darkened neighborhood before he tripped and fell along a home's chain-link fence. The officer shot Blueford three times in the chest, killing him. He said he believed Blueford had a gun, and one was recovered near the body.

properties.name: Derrick Jones
properties.desc: Police said Jones was shot after fleeing from officers questioning him regarding a domestic dispute. The interrogation took place inside the Kwik Cuts Barbershop, which Jones owned.
properties.Description: Derrick Jones, a 37 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 11/08/2010. Police said Jones was shot after fleeing from officers questioning him regarding a domestic dispute. The interrogation took place inside the Kwik Cuts Barbershop, which Jones owned.

properties.name: Jose Munguia
properties.desc: Officers pulled over Munguia's SUV for not having license plates, leading the 21-year-old to flee with a loaded handgun. Officers with a police dog were able to catch up to Munguia, and shot him after he pointed his gun at them.
properties.Description: Jose Munguia, a 21 year old Hispanic/Latino Male was killed by police on 01/21/2014. Officers pulled over Munguia's SUV for not having license plates, leading the 21-year-old to flee with a loaded handgun. Officers with a police dog were able to catch up to Munguia, and shot him after he pointed his gun at them.

properties.name: Bien Cam Tran
properties.desc: Pedestrian Bien Cam Tran was struck by a black-and-white Ford Crown Victoria driven by officer Devin Underwood while Tran was in a crosswalk at about 1:30 p.m. near Lake Merritt.
properties.Description: Bien Cam Tran, a 58 year old Asian/Pacific Islander Male was killed by police on 08/30/2014. Pedestrian Bien Cam Tran was struck by a black-and-white Ford Crown Victoria driven by officer Devin Underwood while Tran was in a crosswalk at about 1:30 p.m. near Lake Merritt.

properties.name: Broderick Huggins
properties.desc: Huggins, from Modesto, was fatally shot by an Alameda County sheriff's deputy after he refused to get out of the vehicle and drove off, dragging one of those deputies, who had been trying to undo Huggins' seat belt.
properties.Description: Broderick Huggins, a 32 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 03/30/2013. Huggins, from Modesto, was fatally shot by an Alameda County sheriff's deputy after he refused to get out of the vehicle and drove off, dragging one of those deputies, who had been trying to undo Huggins' seat belt.

properties.agency: Oakland Police Department, California Highway Patrol
properties.name: Cleora Chrisman
properties.desc: Cleora Chrisman was killed when Sarah McNeil, a driver fleeing police, ran a red light and crashed into Chrisman's car in West Oakland. McNeil was also killed.
properties.Description: Cleora Chrisman, a 67 year old African-American/Black Female was killed by police on 04/07/2006. Cleora Chrisman was killed when Sarah McNeil, a driver fleeing police, ran a red light and crashed into Chrisman's car in West Oakland. McNeil was also killed.

properties.name: Priscilla Johnson
properties.desc: An unnamed woman was killed when she was ejected from a car fleeing from police. At about 8:50 p.m., a man had reportedly tried to buy an item at a San Leandro Radio Shack with counterfeit money. When a clerk confronted him, the man allegedly threatened to harm the clerk and fled the store with the item. The clerk called police. An officer saw the car leaving the scene and a high-speed chase began. The driver turned north onto San Leandro Boulevard and police said the officer lost sight of the car and stopped chasing it. Soon afterward, police reportedly found the car had crashed into a building on San Leandro Boulevard at Apricot Street. The woman died at the scene.
properties.address: San Leandro Boulevard and Apricot Street
properties.Description: Priscilla Johnson, a 45 year old African-American/Black Female was killed by police on 05/23/2014. An unnamed woman was killed when she was ejected from a car fleeing from police. At about 8:50 p.m., a man had reportedly tried to buy an item at a San Leandro Radio Shack with counterfeit money. When a clerk confronted him, the man allegedly threatened to harm the clerk and fled the store with the item. The clerk called police. An officer saw the car leaving the scene and a high-speed chase began. The driver turned north onto San Leandro Boulevard and police said the officer lost sight of the car and stopped chasing it. Soon afterward, police reportedly found the car had crashed into a building on San Leandro Boulevard at Apricot Street. The woman died at the scene.

properties.name: Joshua Russell
properties.desc: A police sergeant Gonzales shot and killed Joshua Russell, 19 after Russell and an accomplice allegedly tried to rob a man at gunpoint in the parking lot of a Burger King.
properties.Description: Joshua Russell, a 19 year old European-American/White Male was killed by police on 03/27/2002. A police sergeant Gonzales shot and killed Joshua Russell, 19 after Russell and an accomplice allegedly tried to rob a man at gunpoint in the parking lot of a Burger King.

properties.name: Addiel Meza
properties.desc: Addiel had been firing a gun on an East Oakland street. He was shot dead by a police officer who responded.
properties.Description: Addiel Meza, a 21 year old Hispanic/Latino Male was killed by police on 02/03/2007. Addiel had been firing a gun on an East Oakland street. He was shot dead by a police officer who responded.

properties.name: Clinton Grandy
properties.desc: Clinton Grandy was killed when his Ford Escort was struck by an allegedly stolen Buick being chased by police.
properties.address: West Grand Avenue and Adeline Street
properties.Description: Clinton Grandy, a 62 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 08/27/2003. Clinton Grandy was killed when his Ford Escort was struck by an allegedly stolen Buick being chased by police.

properties.name: Connectis Guiton
properties.desc: Connectis Guilton was reportedly fleeing from the CHP when his BMW collided with a SUV driven by Mark Aragon, killing both drivers.

properties.name: Marquez Warren
properties.desc: An off-duty Contra Costa County sheriff's deputy shot and killed a home invasion robbery suspect. Officers responded to a call of a home invasion at around 10:44 a.m., police said. It was not disclosed why an off-duty deputy was on the scene.
properties.Description: Marquez Warren, a 19 year old Race unspecified Male was killed by police on 02/01/2017. An off-duty Contra Costa County sheriff's deputy shot and killed a home invasion robbery suspect. Officers responded to a call of a home invasion at around 10:44 a.m., police said. It was not disclosed why an off-duty deputy was on the scene.

properties.Description: Salvador Nieves Jr., a 21 year old Hispanic/Latino Male was killed by police on 05/27/2006. Jessica Castaneda-Rodriguez and Salvador Nieves Jr. were killed when a driver being chased by police ran a red light and crashed into their 2005 Nissan Sentra.

properties.name: Matthew Cicelski
properties.desc: Cicelski, clad in camouflage clothing, had been acting erratically outside ex-girlfriend's home. He pointed a replica assault rifle at them.
properties.Description: Matthew Cicelski, a 30 year old Race unspecified Male was killed by police on 01/29/2011. Cicelski, clad in camouflage clothing, had been acting erratically outside ex-girlfriend's home. He pointed a replica assault rifle at them.

properties.name: Jason Perez
properties.desc: Jason Perez was killed when he crashed into the rear of another car while being chased by police.
properties.Description: Jason Perez, a 20 year old Hispanic/Latino Male was killed by police on 01/30/2006. Jason Perez was killed when he crashed into the rear of another car while being chased by police.

properties.name: Lovelle Mixon
properties.desc: Lovelle Mixon shot and killed two Oakland police officers during a traffic stop, then killed two more when SWAT team officers attempted to apprehend him two hours later. Mixon was killed in a barrage of gunfire as the officers returned fire.
properties.Description: Lovelle Mixon, a 26 year old African-American/Black Male was killed by police on 03/21/2009. Lovelle Mixon shot and killed two Oakland police officers during a traffic stop, then killed two more when SWAT team officers attempted to apprehend him two hours later. Mixon was killed in a barrage of gunfire as the officers returned fire.

properties.name: U’Kendra Johnson
properties.desc: U'Kendra Johnson was killed when her car was broadsided by a Buick fleeing from police.
properties.Description: U’Kendra Johnson, a 22 year old African-American/Black Female was killed by police on 02/16/2002. U'Kendra Johnson was killed when her car was broadsided by a Buick fleeing from police.
